content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'


    -- define column data type
    SELECT
    TOP 100  *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    ) AS [result]
    
-- filter columns

     SELECT
    TOP 100  *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with(
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT

    ) AS [result]


    -- query from folders using wildcard characters
     SELECT
    TOP 100  *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with(
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT

    ) AS [result]

    -- use filename function
     SELECT
    top 100
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with(
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT

    ) AS [result]

    -- query from subfolders
     SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with(
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT

    ) AS [result]

    -- use filepath function to select only from certain partitions
      SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    Count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with(
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT

    ) AS [result]  
    Group BY result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
    order by result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
